text: hi everyone so summer is finally here
and grilling season had just started if
you're running out of ideas on what to
put on the grill today I will share with
you a really cool snack which has
recently become a very popular strict
snack for students and teenagers in
Vietnam is called ban Jiang nu but we
would love to translate it as Vietnamese
pizza keep on watching and you will know
why we caught it that way
you will need rice paper quail eggs
squid chili sauce scallion or spring
onion some butter and pot floss add some
butter on the rice paper to kill eggs
some scallion oil and a little bit of
chilli sauce also scumball some cheese
and spread it around evenly then put on
the grill make sure you set the grilling
rack not too close to the heat because
the rice paper can get burnt very easily
keep rotating the rice paper on the
grill so that the heat can reach to
every corner you can get really creative
with the toppings you can ask ming
paul-charlotte beef jerky chicken flask
pop flowers whatever you like just make
sure that the toppings are in smaller
pieces so that it can get cooked when
the rice paper is no longer translucent
you can fold it over and serve let me
give it a try
mmm super lacquer the cheese and the
butter have melted and they brings all
ingredients together so perfectly the
teenagers in Vietnam are audited to this
snack for a reason really another day I
let my Western friends try this neck on
a grilling party in the park and they
all loved it that day I use party fried
garlic also butter cheese and quail eggs
add toppings you can also top up with
stir-fry beef seafood dry streams etc
this is not really a recipe but more an
idea I think it's really similar to the
western pizza in which we also have a
rau base which is made from rice paper
in our case and you can play around with
the toppings to customize to your
preference some sriracha would be nice
or if you have made your nasal you can
also add it in just be creative because
our mini BBQ grill is pretty small this
time we have come up with the idea to
place the pizza on the rack and move the
rack around it's a lot easier to control
the heat and the rice paper can be
cooked evenly pretty cool isn't it the
rice paper they use for this dish in
Vietnam is a little bit thicker and
sometimes has some coconut flakes in it
so it tastes even more amazing we don't
really have many options for rice paper
here but I'm really happy with this give
it a try and I'm sure you're gonna like
it too thank you for watching well I
Oh
you
you
